title: Computer Vision Based Solution to Nano-liter Liquid Dispenses Quality Control
summary: Collaboration with the Automation Team at Ginkgo Bioworks
description:
In a team of four, we offered three different solutions to detect nano-liter level magnetic bead dispenses from the Echo liquid handler, as quality control for Ginkgo's next-generation sequencing library prep.
 
My personal contribution includes developing and improving the adaptive thresholding method, implementing image registration, and documenting and packaging the code.
